items.text: full on leg, and whipped away to fine leg! Ross Taylor becomes New Zealand's leading run-scorer in ODIs - beating Stephen Fleming. A warm applause for the man
items.postText: List of highest run-scorers for NZ: here.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and he prods forward to defend back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: steered past the keeper! Offcutter, length ball angling away, and Taylor opens the bat's face to run this down very fine. Third man has no chance
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle, and he prods forward to block
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Tim: "I'd say NZ is not a stronger side this year than they were for the last CWC. And in that game, in home conditions, they arguably scraped into the final. Anyone else remember NZvAus in that low scorining game? Or NZvSA which is still probably the best ODI ive ever watched. "
items.text: full just outside off, and defended towards short cover. Fielder misfields, and he's overrun himself, which allows the batsmen to pinch the second run. And to think the ball was barely 10 metres away
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on leg, and he shapes up to pull. Hits the ball onto his pads as it rolls away to short fine leg. Overthrows - and that allows NZ to collect another freebie
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: full just outside off, and he goes for a big heave towards cover. Misses completely
items.postText: Drinks and time for a change in commentary. Ankur's back.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Caleb: "I feel this NZ team is stronger than in 2015, but in that tournament every single important game had at least one player play out of his skin (until the final). On paper we've a better chance this year, but it will require form as well as ability"
items.text: length on middle, pushed to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 1 run

items.text: flatter one, angled in, tucked away to deep squareleg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, pushed to cover point with soft hands and they scamper one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Latham, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on off, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: length, angled in, turned around to squareleg but can't beat the man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: slower ball on middle, nearly chips it to midwicket and also loses control of the bat, which nearly bounces back onto the stumps
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Latham, no run

items.text: full outside off and leans into the drive to pierce the cover field. Caressed it without much of a flourish
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Latham, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Latham, no run

items.text: slower ball but down the leg side and called wide
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Latham, 1 wide

items.text: length and angled in, misses the flick but gets a leg-bye as the ball trickles away towards squareleg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Latham, 1 leg bye

items.text: length outside off, steered to point, who lets it through between his legs and they get a single to third-man. Sloppy from Bangladesh
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: slower ball on off, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Latham, no run

items.preText: Fred: "@Caleb: I agree, the 2015 tournament made a mockery of the tired notion that NZ are 'greater than the sum of their parts'. Some stunning individual performances pulled us through, and usually reliable Williamson had a poor tournament by his standards!"
items.text: length, angled in, skids onto Taylor, who tucks it away to fine-leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, punched to deep cover for one
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Latham, 1 run

items.text: short ball, down the leg side, Taylor misses it on the hook but it's been called a no-ball for the frontfoot, and it was a tight call
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, 1 no ball

items.text: short on middle and even though Taylor's weight is on the frontfoot, he is able to slap it to the deep midwicket fence
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length on middle, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, no run
